name: Scrapyard Gallery
description:
This game requires a raytracing-capable GPU in order to be fully experienced.
RTX 2000 series or AMD RX 6000 series GPU or higher.

Explore a collection of my scrapped 3D artworks, most works here have never been shared publicly before. They have been remade with the original 3D geometry but re-imagined for an interactive medium.

Making this game was an indulgent and transformative experience. Unreal Engine 5 has granted me the ability to take my art which would normally take hours of iteration and rendering in Blender, to only taking a few minutes to be viewable and interactive in real-time with near-identical quality.

How to play / controls:

Mouse & Keyboard
WSAD/Arrow keys to move
Mouse to look around
LMB to interact
    - Click artworks to teleport to their world (I only managed to implement one, it is labelled)
    - Click central and final sculpture to change its shape
      (works well if zoomed in while clicking)
RMB to zoom in
Press R to reset position
F11 to toggle fullscreen

Please enjoy exploring this space, screenshots are encouraged!

Resources used:

Unreal Engine 5 Quixel Megascans

Music from GameDev.tv:

  • "I meditate between the galaxies"
  • "Dawn at Neptune"
  • "Eternal, immutable, majestic"
  • "Magnetic waves of aquarius"
